main event: A witness observed a flying object about 4 to 5 ft wide, gray in color, which hovered, pulsated, spiraled, and emitted vapor before disappearing to the northeast.
interesting points: The object was described as very big, ball-shaped, and bright silver., The witness claimed to have seen this object frequently., The object hovered and then made erratic movements., It was reported that the object did not make any sound., A request for formal investigation was made to the AAF by the witness.
sighted object: a flying spherical object emitting vapor
witness description: The witness is a retired U.S.P.O. employee with excellent eyesight and hearing.
